page.title: 10THE FAMINE IN ETHIOPIA
page.content: The world was horrified when the BBC released pictures of Ethiopians under famine conditions.The pictures showed children with hardly enough strength left to move.The groups already helping to relieve them e.g.OXFAM were under pressure. The functions organised by Bob Geldof have raised over 40 million pounds.The main aid has been given by the younger generation who have decided that something should be done as the governments were not doing all they could to help. The aid will be given to help provide much needed food.
